org.activebpel.rt.bpel.function
Interface IAeFunctionContextLocator

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeFunctionContextLocator
public interface IAeFunctionContextLocator

Interface for class responsible for locating, loading and instantiating IAeFunctionContext impls.

Method Summary
 IAeFunctionContext locate(java.lang.String aNamespace, java.lang.String aLocation, java.lang.String aClassName)
          Find, load, instantiate and return the IAeFunctionContext impl.
 

Method Detail

locate

public IAeFunctionContext locate(java.lang.String aNamespace,
                                 java.lang.String aLocation,
                                 java.lang.String aClassName)
                          throws AeInvalidFunctionContextException
Find, load, instantiate and return the IAeFunctionContext impl.

Parameters:
aNamespace - The namespace of the function context.
aLocation - A location hint for locating the IAeFunctionContextclass. This may be null or empty.
aClassName - The class name of the IAeFunctionContext impl.
Throws:
AeInvalidFunctionContextException
